tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeSchedule (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    EmployeeID INT,
    ScheduleDate DATE,
    StartTime TIME,
    EndTime TIME
);

CREATE TABLE PayrollInfo (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    EmployeeID INT,
    PayDate DATE,
    Salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    Tax DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);
